mapper.select: SELECT g.seq, g.gblNo, g.shipperName, g.rank, g.code, g.tsp, g.destAddress, g.pud, g.rdd, g.arriveDate, g.awbNo, g.ssn, g.pmjDate, g.area AS areaLocal, g.fright, g.eMailAddress, g.oblNo, g.vessle, g.blCompany, g.remark, g.eta, g.sit, g.rate, g.yjNo, g.totalPcs FROM gbl_ib g WHERE g.seq = #{seq}
SELECT DISTINCT tsp AS subCode FROM gbl_ib
SELECT DISTINCT code AS subCode FROM gbl_ib
SELECT count(*) FROM weight_ib WHERE gblSeq = #{seq}
SELECT seq, piece, type, gross, grossKg, tare, net, cuft, reweight, remark, gblSeq FROM weight_ib WHERE gblSeq = #{value}

SELECT gbl_no, gbl_input, gbl_preperation, gbl_delivery, gbl_truckmanifast, gbl_bookinglist, gbl_invoice, gbl_arrival, gbl_process FROM gbl_status WHERE gbl_no = (select gbl_no from gbl_ib where seq = #{value})
SELECT seq, gbl_no, file_name, file_path, file_extension, file_size, gbl_file_no, gbl_update_date FROM gbl_attachments WHERE gbl_no = (select gbl_no from gbl_ib where seq = ${value})

SELECT seq, gbl_no, date, name, ssn, rank, origin_of_shipment, destination, ordering_activity_name, carrier_name, agent_name, signature, carrier_shipment_reference, code, other, total, remark, officer_material, officer_signature, officer_date, rank_and_name, transportation_date, gbl_seq, write_date, write_user FROM dd619_ib WHERE gbl_seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gbl_ib ( gblNo, shipperName, rank, code, tsp, destAddress, pud, rdd, arriveDate, awbNo, ssn, pmjDate, area, fright, eMailAddress, oblNo, vessle, blCompany, remark, eta, sit, rate, yjNo, totalPcs ) VALUES ( #{gblNo}, #{shipperName}, #{rank}, #{code}, #{tsp}, #{destAddress}, #{pud}, #{rdd}, #{arriveDate}, #{awbNo}, #{ssn}, #{pmjDate}, #{areaLocal}, #{fright}, #{eMailAddress}, #{oblNo}, #{vessle}, #{blCompany}, #{remark}, #{eta}, #{sit}, #{rate}, #{yjNo}, #{totalPcs} )
INSERT INTO gbl_status ( gbl_no, gbl_input, gbl_preperation, gbl_delivery, gbl_truckmanifast, gbl_bookinglist, gbl_invoice, gbl_arrival, gbl_process ) VALUES ( #{gblNo}, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 )

INSERT INTO gbl_attachments ( gbl_no, file_name, file_path, file_extension, file_size, gbl_file_no, gbl_update_date ) VALUES ( #{gblNo}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileExtension}, #{fileSize}, #{gblFileNo}, SYSDATE() )
